info.name: Cats Api
info.description: The cats api defines the functionality of a cats adpotion agency. It allows for users to register, login and interact with cats up for adoption. It also contains basic functionality for the cat adoption agency to manage its users and cats

item.name: Auth

request.description: Creates a new User and defaults to the role 'user'

response.name: Empty Request
response.body:
{
    "message": [
        "first_name must be a string",
        "last_name must be a string",
        "email must be an email",
        "username must be a string",
        "password must be a string"
    ],
    "error": "Bad Request",
    "statusCode": 400
}

request.description: Login with email and password and get the user's access and refresh token

response.name: Empty Request

request.description: Fetch User Details of a Session User
Supply a valid refresh token and get a new access token and refresh token

response.name: Empty Request
Invalid Format

request.description: Enforce logout on the backend by invalidating the user's refresh token
Change session user's password

item.description: Auth module, this module defines user creation, authentication and authorization. It contains endpoints for managinf access to the cats api

item.name: Users

request.description: Admin Functionality for granting another user the admin role
Admin function to fetch all users
Admin function for updating a user by their user id
Allows a user to update their non identifying attributes
Allows admin to fetch any user by id

item.description: User management module, for the administrator to have an overview of users, and for users to manage their accounts

item.name: Cats

request.description: Allows admin to create a cat

response.name: Invalid Request Body

request.description: Allows admin to update a cat's information
Fetch a cat by their cat id
fetch all cats in a paginated manner
Allows admin delete a cat by id

item.description: Cats management module, contains endpoints that have to deal with the cats inventory of the adoption agency

item.name: Favorites

request.description: Allows a user to like a cat
Allows a user to undo the liking of a cat
Fetch the likes a cat has had
Fetch the likes a user has made
Allows admin to fetch a user's likes by user id

item.description: Favorites management module, allows users to interact with the cats module by being able to mark and un mark a cat as a favorite
